title: Miranda's Second Chance
description: Five days shy of getting married, Miranda makes a decision that could change her life forever. Deciding to take her bachelorette party into her own hands, Miranda is met with someone from the past, and someone new. A park ranger doubling as a stripper, a crazy ex, one hell of a camping trip and excessive alcohol lead Miranda down a path she didn't know existed. Will she realize that she has a second chance before it's too late, or will she make the same mistake again?Intended for ages 18+. Strong language, explicit sexual situations and hold on to your seat hotness.This is a novella. Approximately 20,000 words
author: Brandi Ratliff
